definition: to check/to verify/to test/to examine/to take an exam/to take an entrance exam for/deceased father

sentences.english: Every monitor must carry out the invigilating responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 每個監考員必須履行監考職責。

sentences.english: Every monitor must carry out the invigilating responsibilities.
sentences.chinese: 每個監考員必須履行監考職責。

sentences.english: The proctor caught him cheating in the maths exam.
sentences.chinese: 監考人員抓住他在數學考試中作弊。

sentences.english: Any student who tries to cheat while the examiner is watching is playing with fire.
sentences.chinese: 在主考監考時任何學生想作弊都是冒險。

sentences.english: He was the invigilator of No. 2 Testroom.
sentences.chinese: 他是第二考場的監考員。

sentences.english: The exam proctor cheerfully led me to my assigned computer.
sentences.chinese: 監考人把我帶到指定的電腦錢。

sentences.english: All the items are not allowed to carry, the invigilator is not responsible for the care of teachers.
sentences.chinese: 所有不準攜帶的物品，監考教師不負責看管。

sentences.english: Proctors are provided by ASQ sections in your area.
sentences.chinese: 監考人員將由你所在區域的ASQ部門提供。

sentences.english: The test administrator/supervisor will assign you a seat.
sentences.chinese: 監考人員將會給你分配座位。

sentences.english: Candidates may not retake a beta exam at any time.
sentences.chinese: 在任何時間都可以重考在線的無監考的考試。

sentences.english: The system can basically meet the need of the management of invigilation . It is of certain practical value.
sentences.chinese: 該系統基本滿足監考管理工作，具有一定的實用價值。

sentences.english: Give the exams to the invigilators at least 30 minutes before the exam.
sentences.chinese: 老師們至少應在考前30分鐘將試卷交給監考老師。

sentences.english: I am arranged to invigilate Junior one's history test.
sentences.chinese: 我被安排了監考初一的歷史。

sentences.english: Invigilators shall fulfill his line of duty according to Work Rules for Invigilators.
sentences.chinese: 監考人員應當按照《監考人員工作規則》履行職責。

definition: to suffer untold hardships (idiom); trials and tribulations/with difficulty/after some effort
vocational secondary school/technical secondary school/trade school/abbr. for 中等專科學校|中等专科学校
unable to go to school/an interruption to one's education
International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO)/abbr. for 國際奧林匹克數學競賽|国际奥林匹克数学竞赛[Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Shu4 xue2 Jing4 sai4]
to attend a class/to go to a lecture
to die in such a way that sb (or sth) else also perishes/to take sb down with oneself/to end in mutual destruction
